mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL, LOC_CODE, AUTH, ADMIN_DELFLAG FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id} AND ADMIN_PW = #{admin_pw} AND ADMIN_DELFLAG='N'
SELECT ADMIN_PW FROM ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id}
SELECT OWNER_PW FROM OWNER WHERE OWNER_ID = #{owner_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN (ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL, LOC_CODE, AUTH, ADMIN_DELFLAG) VALUES(#{admin_id}, #{admin_pw}, #{admin_name}, #{admin_phone}, #{admin_email}, #{loc_code}, 'A', 'N')

INSERT INTO OWNER (OWNER_SEQ, OWNER_ID, OWNER_PW, OWNER_NAME, OWNER_PHONE, OWNER_EMAIL, AUTH, STORE_CODE, OWNER_START, ADMIN_ID) VALUES(OWNER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{owner_id}, #{owner_pw}, #{owner_name}, #{owner_phone}, #{owner_email}, 'U', #{store_code}, #{owner_start}, #{admin_id})
mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL, LOC_CODE, AUTH, ADMIN_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ADMIN_DELFLAG, ADMIN_ID) RNUM, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL, LOC_CODE, AUTH, ADMIN_DELFLAG FROM ADMIN WHERE AUTH='A') WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN WHERE AUTH='A'

SELECT ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL, LOC_CODE, AUTH, ADMIN_DELFLAG FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ADMIN_DELFLAG, ADMIN_ID) RNUM, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_PHONE, ADMIN_EMAIL, LOC_CODE, AUTH, ADMIN_DELFLAG FROM ADMIN WHERE AUTH='A' AND LOC_CODE LIKE #{loc_code}||'%') WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN WHERE AUTH='A' AND LOC_CODE LIKE #{loc_code}||'%'

SELECT OWNER_SEQ, OWNER_ID, OWNER_NAME, OWNER_PHONE, OWNER_EMAIL, STORE_CODE, OWNER_START, OWNER_END FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY OWNER_SEQ) RNUM, OWNER_SEQ, OWNER_ID, OWNER_PW, OWNER_NAME, OWNER_PHONE, OWNER_EMAIL, AUTH, STORE_CODE, OWNER_START, OWNER_END FROM OWNER WHERE STORE_CODE IN (SELECT STORE_CODE FROM STORE WHERE LOC_CODE = #{loc_code})) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OWNER WHERE STORE_CODE IN (SELECT STORE_CODE FROM STORE WHERE LOC_CODE = #{loc_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN SET ADMIN_DELFLAG='Y' WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id}
UPDATE OWNER SET OWNER_END= #{owner_end} WHERE OWNER_SEQ = #{owner_seq}
